reuze.pending

Class MD2_Loader

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.pending.MD2_Loader

  • public class MD2_Loader
extends Object
    This class is used to load MD2 models. This functionality has been split from the MD2_Model class to aid future development. The following feature(s) of the MD2 model format have not been implement yet: multiple skin files
    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MD2_Loader.GL_Vertex
      For each point in the model we store the texture coordinates and an index value to an array of Vector that hold the XYZ coordinates.

      void getGLcommands()
      * Get the OpenGL commands to be used (GL_TRIANGLE_STRIP or * GL_TRIANGLE_FAN) and the vertices (index to points array * and texture coordinates)
      MD2_Model loadModel(String modelFilename, String texFilename)
      This method performs 3 main tasks 1) Create the model texture 2) Load the model data from file 3) Create a MD2_Model object

      • loadModel

        public MD2_Model loadModel(String modelFilename,
                  String texFilename)
        This method performs 3 main tasks 1) Create the model texture 2) Load the model data from file 3) Create a MD2_Model object
        Parameters:

        texFilename -
        Returns:
        a MD2_Model object or null if unsuccessful
